original_text: Then the Lord will scatter you among all nations, from one end of the earth to the other. There you will worship other gods—gods of wood and stone, which neither you nor your ancestors have known.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너를 땅 이 끝에서 저 끝까지 만민 중에 흩으시리니 네가 그 곳에서 너와 네 조상들이 알지 못하던 목석 우상을 섬길 것이라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord will scatter you
from one end of the earth to the other
There you will worship other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 너희는 다른 신들을 섬길 것이다

sentences.original_text: which neither you nor your ancestors have known
sentences.korean_translation: 너희나 너희 조상이 알지 못했던 신들
